title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in the dynamic text item is different from the format displayed in the data/text item.
OB: It is not clear from the bug report what the observed behavior is. Please provide more details on the specific values and formats displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
EB: The expected behavior is for the datetime values to be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a table with datetime values. 
2. Create a dynamic text item and a data/text item. 
3. Set the content of both items to be the datetime values retrieved from the table. 
4. Save and preview the page. 
5. Verify that the datetime values displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item are in different formats.
